name: Dialogue System Demo
description:
Dialogue System Demo

I spent a lot of time designing this system and ran out of time to finish implementing it into a minimum viable product, however, have prepared a short showcase of its features.

Controls:
  • W/A/S/D - Movement & Dialogue Selection
  • E - Select & View More Dialogue Options
  • Q - Leave Dialogue
Dialogue System Features:
  • Branching Dialogue Options
  • Preset Dialogue Trees
  • NPC Personalities & Emotions
  • Dialogue Selection based on NPC emotion
  • Flexible number of player dialogue choices (Min 1, Max Unlimited)
  • Flexible number of NPC Responses (Min 1, Max 20)
